pages.text: Thanks to Pickle Tweaks, you can now repair your tools in a crafting grid using the material that your tool is made out of. $(br2)So if you wanted to repair your broken diamond pickaxe, you can use three diamonds to fully repair it in a 3x3 crafting grid.
You can also partially repair your tools by combining one at a time, if needed. $(br2)Does it keep your enchantments? $(br2)Yes, it does.
